Klant looks to see the Cybertronian Fire gone.

Klant: ......Damn. Anyway, =
Torca, I was thinking we'd find another faction, right now, and leave the M=
aximals hanging. We have not been treated well. I know I haven't been, but =
I'd like to hear it now, when have you actually enjoyed being with the Maxi=
mals?...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, May 20, 2001 1:09 AM
  Subject: My M=
aximals


  :::Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Orion::: 

  ::Torca looks at Klant:=
: 
  Torca: What were you getting at during the fight? 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::My oth=
er Maximals have realized for the first time that the CF was gone:: 
  Side=
swipe: Well, there goes our home. 
  Ratchet: Yep. Just like the Ark. 
  Si=
deswipe: Remember back when we, along with Striker and Spears, were the 
  =
only defenders of the Ark? 
  Ratchet: Yeah. Those were the days.... hmm. S=
triker and Spears. I miss those 
  two as well. 
  Orion: Alright, quit the=
 trip down memory lane! I think i can actually see 
  things getting wavy! =

  Sideswipe: hey, Bluestreak was a big player in the old days. Least until=
 he 
  met Andromeda. 
  Orion: Ive already heard the stories from my paren=
ts a zillion times.  Thats 
  all they ever talk about! 
  Ratchet: Well, i=
 guess it's time to move on. Maybe when things quiet down, 
  you can final=
ly meet your uncle Prowl. 
  ::Ratchet opens a comm to Iron Raptor:: 
  Rat=
chet: Is there anyhting we can do commander?
